page.title: 13What do you think?
page.content: Most of the people who live in this area do so because they love its beauty,tranquility and peace.Some are anti_tourism because they fear that their surroundings will be spoilt by the introduction of tourist facilities Others are glad for townspeople to be able to share their good fortune in living in such a beautiful area. When the Water_board made more car_ parks and opened up footpaths round the nearby reservoirs the local resid ents were worried that it would bring too big an influx of visitors but admit that this has not been the case. No_one to whom we spoke was at all worried by the lack of water and sewage mains.They all had adequate private water supplies and sewage disposal systems.
